verbs.description: You [V: do] n't have to be on Twitter , or even have an internet connection , to see some of President Donald Trump 's most famous tweets .
You do n't [V: have] to be on Twitter , or even have an internet connection , to see some of President Donald Trump 's most famous tweets .
[ARG1: You] do n't have to [V: be] [ARG2: on Twitter] , or even have an internet connection , [ARGM-PRP: to see some of President Donald Trump 's most famous tweets] .
[ARG0: You] do n't have to be on Twitter , or [ARGM-ADV: even] [V: have] [ARG1: an internet connection] , to see some of President Donald Trump 's most famous tweets .
[ARG0: You] do n't have to be on Twitter , or even have an internet connection , to [V: see] [ARG1: some of President Donald Trump 's most famous tweets] .
